channel.title: How to add commands (barrage ko)
channel.description:
i wanna add ::kbd, ::rules,::commands ect
anyone help or add my msn and to teamviewer to help me code my server :d

item.title: How to add commands (barrage ko)
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

[quote=“Willy W0nka, post:14, topic:370440”]I DONT EVEN WANT TO TRY
can u do for me
dale_9000@hotmail.com

TEAMVIEWER[/quote]

If you won’t at least try, after he explained it so simply, then why not just give up? This is basic stuff and if you can’t do this then it’s clearly not for you.

The best way to learn is to try yourself. First create a folder called “backup” and dump a copy of everything in there, then play about with the original and if you stuff it up just revert to the back up…

Read full topic

item.title: How to add commands (barrage ko)
item.dc:creator: @_John `John
item.description:
@_John wrote:

[quote=“owner purez, post:10, topic:370440”]undo everything you did and do this

Step1: go to KBD and get the coords ("::mypos")
Step2: open client.java and search for “home”
underneath the closing }, add the following

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kbd")) { toX = X COORD HERE; toY = Y COORD HERE; sM("You teleport to the King Black Dragon."); }

Insert that, and change the X COORD HERE and Y COORD HERE to your x,y.
save and compile[/quote]

Sure, let’s spoonfeed.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add commands (barrage ko)
item.dc:creator: @owner_purez owner purez
item.description:
@owner_purez wrote:

undo everything you did and do this

Step1: go to KBD and get the coords ("::mypos")
Step2: open client.java and search for “home”
underneath the closing }, add the following

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kbd")) { toX = X COORD HERE; toY = Y COORD HERE; sM("You teleport to the King Black Dragon."); }

Insert that, and change the X COORD HERE and Y COORD HERE to your x,y.
save and compile

Read full topic

Willy W0nka:

client.java?

Sigh…

Yes, that’s what the client class is. client.java.

item.title: How to add commands (barrage ko)
item.dc:creator: @_John `John
item.description:
@_John wrote:

Delta I’m gonna presume.

These go in the client class, under the customCommands string.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kbd")) {
toX = X COORD HERE;
toY = Y COORD HERE;
sM("You teleport to the King Black Dragon.");
}

Read full topic
